Directions: Prepare quick bread batter according to package directions.  stir in the remaining ingredients.  Pour into a greased 9-in. x 5-in. x 3-in. loaf pan.  Bake at 350 degrees F for 55-60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.  Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack.
Ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package cranberry or blueberry quick bread mix
